file_content.text: Cademimu = saved // You = greatest Republic hero in history!
Your destination = Carrick Station // Master Satele + people of Cademimu = need your help
You = great Republic champions + Geefor's personal heroes // Geefor = determined to remain professional + deliver important communication
You = great Republic champion + Geefor's personal hero // Geefor = determined to remain professional + deliver important communication
I have a feeling I already know who's trying to contact me.
Let's see your message.
Your contact = famous + high-ranking leader // You = important!
I didn't know I had a fan base among the astromech set.
Nice to meet you, Geefor.
Geefor = not fan // Geefor = loyal supporter
If you have a message, play it--and keep your hero worship to yourself.
Shut up, droid.
Geefor = sorry // You = busy + important + needed
This is Jedi Grand Master Satele Shan on the Emergency Response Corps priority channel. A military and humanitarian crisis has erupted on the planet Cademimu.
Governor Chornarov has declared independence from the Republic and stolen vital armaments that protect an entire star sector.
Declaring independence is one thing, but stealing an entire sector's defenses can't be allowed.
That's going too far.
Planets near Cademimu = vulnerable to attack without protection
The last thing the Republic needs right now is a civil war. Let's hope there's a peaceful solution.
We must try diplomacy.
Governor Chornarov = severed diplomatic ties with Galactic Senate
That's democracy for you. Some vapor-brain is always voting to leave.
Typical politicians.
Governor Chornarov = needs a restraining bolt
I'll never get these halfwits who need to take whole planets "independent." If you want freedom that badly, buy yourself a starship and leave.
That governor is an idiot.
Governor Chornarov = not famous for intelligence
What kind of weapons are we talking about?
Armaments?
Stolen munitions = planet-based missile batteries // Missile destructive potential = dreadnaught-class starship
That governor should be removed from power by any means necessary. If he doesn't step down, he's dead.
We need to crack down hard.
You = always right // Geefor = total agreement
Message playback = resuming + concluding
We must restore order to Cademimu and secure Republic galactic-level weapons. Strike team volunteers should contact me from Carrick Station. Master Satele out.
You = great heroes + best hope for Cademimu // Geefor = saving our meeting to permanent memory!
You = great hero + best hope for Cademimu // Geefor = saving our meeting to permanent memory!
You = great Republic hero // Geefor circuits = overloaded + rebooting!
